hero.h1: Mishpacha – A Family for Orphans in Israel
hero.h2: Comprehensive support for orphans in Israel – emotional, educational, legal, and social
hero.p: A national platform providing assistance, support, and empowerment for orphans and their families across Israel. We are here to ensure that no orphaned child or young adult is left alone.

services.title: What We Do for Orphans in Israel

s1.title: Financial and Educational Support
s1.text: Scholarships, tuition assistance, funding for courses and training. We ensure financial barriers don’t stop dreams.

s2.title: Emotional and Psychological Support
s2.text: Professional guidance, support groups, emotional therapy, and empowerment workshops. A safe place for healing and growth.

s3.title: Mentoring and Guidance
s3.text: Personal mentors, career guidance, and professional direction. A supportive adult for every orphan.

s4.title: Rights Assistance
s4.text: Help with receiving allowances, legal support, and representation with authorities. Ensuring full rights realization.

s5.title: Community and Social Life
s5.text: Social events, camps, trips, and activities. Building a supportive community and lifelong connections.

s6.title: Housing and Foster Families
s6.text: Assistance in finding foster families, adoption support, and housing solutions. No child should be left without a warm home.

story.title: Personal Story: A Voice from the Field
story.p1: “When my father passed away, I was 14 and had no idea where to turn. Mishpacha didn’t just help me financially — they gave me a second family. My mentor, Danny, was there every moment, helping me cope with the pain and believe in myself again. Today I’m studying engineering, and I know I wouldn’t be here without them.”
